sentence: At CPAC a couple of weeks ago, I had the opportunity to interview Ohio US Senate Candidate Mike Gibbons.
author: Scott Hounsell
title: CPAC Interview: Ohio Senate Candidate Mike Gibbons

sentence: Cleveland businessman and leading Republican Senate candidate Mike Gibbons joins FOX News Radio's Jessica Rosenthal to discuss past controversial comments, specifically about people of Asian descent, and more on "The Fox News Rundown."
author: Fox News Staff
title: The New York Times hates any conservative: GOP Ohio Senate candidate

sentence: Ohio Republican Senate candidate Mike Gibbons on Wednesday rolled out an ad touting his own business experience as the race for the GOP nomination in the state turns ugly.
title: Gibbons rolls out ad touting business experience as Ohio Senate primary turns ugly

sentence: A spokesperson for Gibbons's campaign told TheBlaze that "Mike Gibbons does not support tax increases on any Americans â€“ and never has."

title: Ohio Senate candidate Mike Gibbons says middle-class Americans don't pay 'any kind of fair share' of income taxes
